title: Brane World in a Topological Black Holes in Asymptotically Flat Spacetime
abstract: We study static brane configurations in the bulk background of the topological black holes in asymptotically flat spacetime. We find that such configurations are possible even for flat black hole horizon, unlike the AdS black hole case. We construct the brane world model with an orbifold structure S^1/Z_2 in such bulk background. We also study massless bulk scalar field.
